title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in South Sudan 2024
yAxis: GDP per capita in U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in South Sudan from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 .
GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a Year .
It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
gold: The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in South Sudan from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024.
GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year.
It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth .
